globalAttributes.name: x-data
globalAttributes.description: Declare a new Alpine component and its data for a block of HTML

globalAttributes.name: x-init
globalAttributes.description: Run an expression when a component is initialized

globalAttributes.name: x-show
globalAttributes.description: Toggle the visibility of an element using CSS display property

globalAttributes.name: x-if
globalAttributes.description: Conditionally add/remove a block of HTML from the page entirely

globalAttributes.name: x-for
globalAttributes.description: Create new DOM nodes for each item in an array

globalAttributes.name: x-model
globalAttributes.description: Synchronize a piece of data with an input element (two-way binding)

globalAttributes.name: x-text
globalAttributes.description: Set the text content of an element

globalAttributes.name: x-html
globalAttributes.description: Set the inner HTML of an element (use with caution - XSS risk)

globalAttributes.name: x-bind
globalAttributes.description: Dynamically set HTML attributes on an element

globalAttributes.name: x-ref
globalAttributes.description: Reference elements directly by their specified keys using this.$refs

globalAttributes.name: x-cloak
globalAttributes.description: Hide an element until Alpine is fully loaded on the page

globalAttributes.name: x-transition
globalAttributes.description: Apply smooth transitions to an element as it's shown or hidden

globalAttributes.name: x-effect
globalAttributes.description: Execute a script each time one of its dependencies change

globalAttributes.name: x-ignore
globalAttributes.description: Prevent Alpine from initializing a block of HTML

globalAttributes.name: x-teleport
globalAttributes.description: Transport part of your Alpine template to another part of the DOM

globalAttributes.name: x-modelable
globalAttributes.description: Expose any Alpine property as the target of x-model

globalAttributes.name: x-id
globalAttributes.description: Generate unique IDs for HTML elements and ensure they're accessible
